moves.8. Re1: White wants my e pawn.  Gotta have it.
Ok so I lost a pawn but it may not matter too much given the disparity in development.
moves.13... Qd6 14. g3 Nxf2: Best move of the game...  white loses Queen and a pawn for two minor pieces if 15. Kxf2, ...
moves.15. Bf4 Nh3+: It took a while to find this obvious attacking move.
moves.16. Kh1 Qd7: Looking to threaten white's Queen again...
moves.17. Nd2 Bg4 18. Qc1: Probably the best but weak nonetheless.
moves.18... g5: Not too worried about opening my King given white's so many backward pieces...this will now open a line for my rook.
moves.19. Be3: Astonishing that a Bishop check is mate but for  white's Knight.  Let's try to get rid of him.  I'm hoping white doesn't notice.
moves.19... Rf3 20. Nb3: Probably the worst move possible ...20. Rf1...could have bailed him out.
